definition: within and without the borders/domestic and foreign/home and abroad

sentences.english: The ‘East Turkistan’ separatist forces have made several terrorist attacks within and outside China’s borders.
sentences.chinese: “東突”恐怖勢力多次在我國境內外製造恐怖事件。

sentences.english: Flights in and out of Finland and Norway are also affected
sentences.chinese: 芬蘭和挪威境內外的航班都受到了影響。

sentences.english: Domestic and foreign firms with demand for high technology will be invited to the event.
sentences.chinese: 邀請具有技術需求的境內外企業參與交易。

sentences.english: Hanyang District makes an invitation to a total of more than 300 enterprises inside and outside.
sentences.chinese: 漢陽區共向300多個境內外企業發出邀請。

sentences.english: Are you expecting more donations from outside China or inside China?
sentences.chinese: 你們期待中國境內外的更多捐贈麼？

sentences.english: It shall be a corporate legal entity incorporated in and outside China.
sentences.chinese: 中國境內外依法設立的企業法人。

sentences.english: ChinaSat will collect channel lease fees from Clients inside and outside of China.
sentences.chinese: “中國衛星”將向中國境內外客戶收取頻道租賃費。

sentences.english: The off- and onshore markets are still separated by a cliff of controls.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府仍然通過嚴格的控制將境內外市場區分開。
